mapper.select: select ms_project_id, test_in_project_id, eid, name, third_party_projectid, status, create_time from ms_project_testin_project_team where ms_project_id = #{msProjectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ms_project_id, test_in_project_id, eid, name, third_party_projectid, status, create_time from ms_project_testin_project_team where ms_project_id = #{msProjectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into ms_project_testin_project_team(ms_project_id, test_in_project_id, eid, name, third_party_projectid, status, create_time) values (#{msProjectId}, #{testInProjectId}, #{eid}, #{name}, #{thirdPartyProjectid}, #{status}, #{createTime})

insert into ms_project_testin_project_team(ms_project_id, test_in_project_id, eid, name, third_party_projectid, status, create_time) values
(#{entity.msProjectId}, #{entity.testInProjectId}, #{entity.eid}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.thirdPartyProjectid}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.createTime})

insert into ms_project_testin_project_team(ms_project_id, test_in_project_id, eid, name, third_party_projectid, status, create_time) values
(#{entity.msProjectId}, #{entity.testInProjectId}, #{entity.eid}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.thirdPartyProjectid}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.createTime})
on duplicate key update ms_project_id = values(ms_project_id), test_in_project_id = values(test_in_project_id), eid = values(eid), name = values(name), third_party_projectid = values(third_party_projectid), status = values(status), create_time = values(create_time)
mapper.update:
update ms_project_testin_project_team
ms_project_id = #{msProjectId},
test_in_project_id = #{testInProjectId},
eid = #{eid},
name = #{name},
third_party_projectid = #{thirdPartyProjectid},
status = #{status},
create_time = #{createTime},
where ms_project_id = #{msProjectId}
